titles.title: The Steadfast Love Of The Lord Never Ceases

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases.
His mercies never come to an end.
They are new every morning,
New every morning.
Great is thy faithfulness Lord.
Great is thy faithfulness.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
El perpetuo amor del Señor nunca falla,
Sus misericordias nunca se terminaran,
Nuevas son cada mañana, cada mañana,
Grande es tu fidelidad,
Oh Dios, grande es tu fidelidad.
